name: Goodbye Groundhog
description:
// PURCHASE for ~ $1 via THIS BUNDLE, not this page

A Short, Simple, (beta) Tower Defense Adventure

When winter fails to end, it can mean only betrayal, my forest friends. The groundhogs have failed you, but I won't. You deserve a revolution-- they deserve justice!

Goodbye Groundhogs! Goodbye Groundhogs!

Help Chuck defend his family and warm the hearts of a desperate, fuzzy mob in this simple, brief, and slightly chilling tower defense!

Help the groundhogs...

  • Explore the snowy peaks of Mount Forest!
  • Warm your heart with art by Korio Fox and Nastya Stepanova!
  • Scramble and dodge as your towers deal in this highly-mobile tower defense!
  • Launch abilities and turn the tide of battle!
  • Meet fuzzy friends who will help you escape!

Not in the budget? Send us a DM and we'll get you a code.
